Reviews.Title: “Scary & Noisy Guests”
Reviews.Author: ajcloward
Reviews.Content: motel 6 near airport guests missed flight connecting somehow appear night people coming couple fighting screaming suppose traveling couple annoying loud muffler truck sit parking lot rev engine hed tear lot 12 hour hed tear parking lot rev engine inside process repeat till 6am finally stopped front wall window door held masking tape hear outside drunk person throwing drunk couple stumbling stairs themselves standard motel 6 fare retro bedspread tv tried plug cell phones lap top outlet bedroom wall plate fell wall plaster crumbling floor time recommend emergency situation else tight budget mentioned dont matter

Reviews.Title: “Good To Save Money - More Supplies Needed”
Reviews.Author: cow_manx
Reviews.Content: stayed decade ago pretty impressed it’s probably budget stay near seattle biggest shortcomings limited towels pillows provided ancient tv plus price epic water pressure shower location exits seattle you’re driving don’t car don’t bother considering location there’s it’s easiest you’re passing road trip don’t pay hotel prices seattle pretty i’ll probably return i’m looking save bit money

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Seattle South
HotelInfo.Address: 20651 Military Rd, Seattle, WA 98198
